content.rendered:
Both looks are from FWRD.COM and the earrings are from FWRD as well. Crystal Prada bag is from Nordstrom.com. Top leather padded bag is from Bottega Veneta.

THE LEATHER TREND – HAPPY 2020!

I’m still celebrating 2020 with some of my favorite trends, like the leather trend and the sporty trend! This year, it’s all about looking “cool” with a mix of modern ’90s sporty style with faux leather shirts, leather dresses, and leather pants. This trend pairs modern shapes and cuts with classic fabrics for a sharp new look. From bags and leggings to entire leather outfits, this look is going to be spotted in your feeds and on the streets throughout 2020. 

Starting off with one of the most coveted bags of 2020, the Bottega Veneta padded cassette bag that every Instagram influencer seems to have their hands on. It’s a great investment bag for sure – with its minimalist vibes and eye-catching details, it will fit with any style. 

Continuing the leather trend into another bag, we have the Prada bag. Like the Bottega Veneta bag, the Prada bag makes a great investment. A chic blend of leather and crystals, it’s the perfect bag for special nights out.

These sleek looks will be complemented by slicked-back hair in silky ponies, fresh faces, and strong brows. Pair these with D’Lashes Matte Lipstick in a punchy color and a flirty pair of D’Lashes Strip Lashes to continue celebrating the New Year all year long!

Which part of the leather trend are you most excited to wear this year? Let us know in the comments or send a DM to our Instagram.

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2020!

XO XO, Dionne 

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
